mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, product_name, product_detail, product_price, product_stock, product_status, p.user_id, ur.username, p.create_time, p.update_time, pic.pic_id, pic.url, c.id, c.name FROM product p LEFT JOIN users ur ON (p.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN picture pic ON (p.product_id = pic.product_id) LEFT JOIN class_product cp ON (cp.p_id = p.product_id ) LEFT JOIN class c ON (cp.class_id = c.id) LEFT JOIN prepurchase pre ON (pre.product_id = p.product_id) WHERE product_status = 1;

SELECT p.product_id, product_name, product_detail, product_price, product_stock, product_status, p.user_id, ur.username, p.create_time, p.update_time, pic.pic_id, pic.url, c.id, c.name FROM product p LEFT JOIN users ur ON (p.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN picture pic ON (p.product_id = pic.product_id) LEFT JOIN class_product cp ON (cp.p_id = p.product_id ) LEFT JOIN class c ON (cp.class_id = c.id) LEFT JOIN prepurchase pre ON (pre.product_id = p.product_id) WHERE p.product_id=#{proId};
